nodes_limitations.description: TODO DS-2341 Remove this field once everything is implemented to use the NodeRestrictions.

account_id.description: AccountID which account the deployment belongs to (models.Account).

cluster_resource_name.description: ClusterResourceName k8s resource name for deployment, built from [data service short name + name + id].

configuration.description: Configuration data service specific configuration for the deployment (models.ApplicationConfigurationTemplate).

connection_details.description: ConnectionDetails urls, ports, credentials, etc for connecting to the data service.

deployment_target_id.description: DeploymentTargetID on which target the data service is deployed (models.DeploymentTarget).

dns_zone.description: DNSZone domain which this deployment should be a part of (eg pds-dns.io).

id.description: ID is auto generated on creation

initialize.description: Initialize used to control startup scripts.

load_balancer_source_ranges.description: LoadBalancerSourceRanges can be used to restrict access to the data service (eg 37.0.113.0/24;82.0.220.42/24).

name.description: Name given by user when creating the deployment.

namespace_id.description: NamespaceID in which namespace the data service is deployed (models.Namespace).

node_count.description: NodeCount total nodes in the deployment.

project_id.description: ProjectID which project the deployment belongs to (models.Project).

resources.description: Resources k8s resources for each node in the deployment (models.ResourceSettingsTemplate).

tenant_id.description: TenantID which tenant the deployment belongs to (models.Tenant).

tls_enabled.description: Whether Transport Layer Security support is enabled

tls_issuer.description: The Issuer (~Certificate Authority) for the TLS certificates

id.description: ID is auto generated on creation
ID is auto generated on creation

details.description: More detailed error message possibly containing the root cause.

message.description: High level human-readable error message determined by the ErrorCode.

json_key.description: JSON key for the Google Storage account.

project_id.description: Project ID of the Google project.

id.description: ID is auto generated on creation
ID is auto generated on creation

downsize_enabled.description: Whether downsizing the cluster is enabled during editing.

resize_disabled.description: List of all node sizes that are not allowed to change during editing.

simple_config.description: List of all allowed node sizes.

id.description: ID is auto generated on creation

cpu_limit.description: Maximal amount of CPU cores the deployment will have access to inside k8s.

cpu_request.description: Minimal amount of CPU cores the deployment will get reserved inside k8s.

memory_limit.description: Maximal amount of RAM the deployment will have access to inside k8s.

memory_request.description: Minimal amount of RAM the deployment will get reserved inside k8s.

name.description: Name of the template. Must be unique for a specific data service within the tenant scope.

storage_request.description: Amount of disk space the deployment will get reserved inside k8s.

cpu_request.description: Minimal amount of CPU cores the deployment will get reserved inside k8s.

memory_limit.description: Maximal amount of RAM the deployment will have access to inside k8s.

memory_request.description: Minimal amount of RAM the deployment will get reserved inside k8s.

name.description: Name of the template. Must be unique for a specific data service within the tenant scope.

storage_request.description: Amount of disk space the deployment will get reserved inside k8s.

apply_status.description: Status of sending Restore CR to the Target Cluster

backup_job_id.description: ID of the backup to be restored, the job might be already deleted

cloud_credential_name.description: Identifier of the PX cloud credentials of the storage with the backup

cloud_snap_id.description: ID of the PX cloud snapshot with the backup

completion_time.description: Completion time of the restore process

deployment_id.description: ID of the new deployment that will contain restored data

error_code.description: Error code of the restore from Target Cluster

id.description: ID is auto generated on creation

original_deployment_id.description: ID of the old deployment where the backup comes from, might be already deleted

start_time.description: Starting time of the restore process

status.description: Status of the restore process on the Target Cluster

access_key.description: Access key for the AWS IAM user.

secret_key.description: Secret key for the AWS IAM user.

id.description: ID is auto generated on creation

fg.description: This option enforces volume group policy. If a volume belonging to a group cannot find nodes for its replication sets which dont have other volumes of same group, the volume creation will fail.

name.description: Name of the template. Must be unique within the tenant scope.

provisioner.description: Portworx volume provisioner. Valid values are: "pxd.portworx.com" for PX CSI, "kubernetes.io/portworx-volume" for PX in-tree or "auto" for auto-detect

secure.description: Flag to create an encrypted volume. Currently, not supported (should be set to `false`).

external_id.description:
ExternalID identifies a User in context of its Issuer. Therefore, it must
be unique in the context of the Issuer. But not necessarily unique across different issuers.
In case of PX Central the ExternalID is the 'sub' claim from JWT token

id.description: ID is auto generated on creation

issuer.description:
Issuer identifies the identity provider where the User is originating from.
It corresponds to the 'iss' claim in the JWT token. Example: "https://central.portworx.com"

id.description: ID is auto generated on creation
ID is auto generated on creation

name.description: Name of the UserAPIKey. Must be unique for the given User.

backup_target_id.description: BackupTargetID and BackupPolicyID must be both specified.

enabled.description: Whether the UserAPIKey is enabled or disabled.

name.description: The name of the UserAPIKey.

backup_id.description: BackupID which backup created the snapshot (nullable).

backup_spec.description: BackupSpecJSON is the specification of the Backup in JSON format at the time the snapshot was taken.

cloud_snap_id.description: CloudSnapID snapshot of the backup volume.

data_service_spec.description: BackupSpecJSON is the specification of the Backup in JSON format at the time the snapshot was taken.

deployment_id.description: DeploymentID which deployment was backed up (nullable).

name.description: Name of the BackupJob.

completion_status.description: Status of the restore process on the Target Cluster

error_code.description: Error code of the restore from Target Cluster

apiGroup.description:
APIGroup is the group for the resource being referenced.
If APIGroup is not specified, the specified Kind must be in the core API group.
For any other third-party types, APIGroup is required.
+optional

kind.description: Kind is the type of resource being referenced

name.description: Name is the name of resource being referenced
